database.name: h2
database.recordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordDeletionQuery: DELETE FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordMergeQuery: MERGE INTO {{TABLE_NAME}} (partition_key, timestamp, data, [{{EXT_FIELD}}], record_id) KEY (record_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, [?], ?)
database.recordRetrievalQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data, [{{EXT_FIELD}}] FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE partition_key >= ? and partition_key < ? AND timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ? LIMIT ?,?
database.recordRetrievalWithIdsQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data, [{{EXT_FIELD}}] FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE record_id IN ({{RECORD_IDS}})

recordTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE {{TABLE_NAME}} (record_id VARCHAR(128), timestamp BIGINT, data BINARY, [{{EXT_FIELD}} VARCHAR(4000)], partition_key INT, PRIMARY KEY(record_id))
